Content: Battles should be limited to 15 major pieces per player and no more
than 60 pieces total. (So everything is abstracted into groups until
only 60 groups total and not much more then 15 per player are left.)
During the abstraction bigger pieces (like titanic space-ships or giant
space-stations) should be individuals for longer, since they command
more attention. So we may abstract the escort of a large asset while it
is still an individual ship, before we later combine them if further
